testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access the Refund & Reason List through the API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request with valid authorization information is sent to the /api/refundReasonList endpoint, the
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/refundReasonList" path parameters..................passed * The API user sends a GET request and records the response from the api refundReasonList endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "success".passed
